statements: SELECT * FROM gamification_data
SELECT user_id, points FROM gamification_data WHERE game_id = 1
SELECT platform, source FROM gamification_data WHERE points > 100
SELECT game_id, points, platform FROM gamification_data ORDER BY points DESC
SELECT user_id, game_id, points, platform, source FROM gamification_data WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT * FROM gamification_data WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY points DESC, user_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, game_id, points FROM gamification_data WHERE platform = 'PC' AND source = 'Online' ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, SUM(points) as total_points FROM gamification_data GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_points DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT user_id, AVG(points) as avg_points FROM gamification_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_points > 50 ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 7
SELECT user_id, MIN(points) as min_points, MAX(points) as max_points FROM gamification_data WHERE source = 'Mobile' GROUP BY user_id HAVING max_points - min_points > 20 ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 6
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, MAX(score) AS top_score FROM user_scores GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_scores WHERE game_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_scores ON users.user_id = user_scores.user_id WHERE user_scores.score > 100 ORDER BY user_scores.score DESC, users.username ASC
SELECT username, email FROM users LEFT JOIN user_scores ON users.user_id = user_scores.user_id WHERE user_scores.game_id = 3
SELECT DISTINCT users.username, user_scores.game_id FROM users CROSS JOIN user_scores WHERE user_scores.score < 50

SELECT users.username, user_scores.score, user_scores.timestamp FROM users INNER JOIN user_scores ON users.user_id = user_scores.user_id WHERE users.platform_id = 2 AND user_scores.timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY user_scores.timestamp ASC
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM user_scores GROUP BY game_id ORDER BY avg_score DESC, total_users
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profile WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT email, username FROM user_profile WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM achievement_log GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM game_scores WHERE play_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT username, email FROM user_profile WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE platform_id = 2 ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT username, score, play_date FROM user_profile JOIN game_scores ON user_profile.user_id = game_scores.user_id WHERE game_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM game_scores GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY highest_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT username, description FROM user_profile JOIN achievement_log ON user_profile.user_id = achievement_log.user_id WHERE achievement_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM gamification_users;
SELECT username, email FROM gamification_users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT badge_name, badge_date FROM gamification_badges WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, score, level_number FROM gamification_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM gamification_platforms WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM gamification_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM gamification_users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, score FROM gamification_users JOIN gamification_scores ON gamification_users.user_id = gamification_scores.user_id WHERE score > 1000;
SELECT badge_name, badge_date FROM gamification_badges ORDER BY badge_date DESC;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM gamification_platforms WHERE registration_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM game_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, display_name, level FROM player_profile WHERE level > 20;
SELECT game_id, user_id, score FROM leaderboards WHERE rank <= 10 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, achievement_name, description FROM achievements WHERE user_id = 123456;
SELECT user_id, item_id, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, game_id, score FROM game_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT user_id, display_name, level FROM player_profile WHERE level >= 50 ORDER BY level DESC, display_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, achievement_name, timestamp FROM achievements WHERE achievement_name LIKE '%completed%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT game_id, user_id, score, rank FROM leaderboards WHERE rank <= 10 ORDER BY rank ASC, score DESC;
SELECT user_id, item_id, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY user_id, item_id ASC;
